mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply (rno, bno, id, pw, reply) VALUES (seq_reply_rno.NEXTVAL, #{bno}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{reply})
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, id, reply, TO_CHAR(updatedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') updatedate FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{bno} ORDER BY rno ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_reply SET reply = #{reply}, updatedate = SYSDATE WHERE rno = #{rno} AND pw = #{pw}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(rno) FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{bno}
